item.title: US, China Agree to Trade Truce
item.description: The United States and China have finalized a trade truce reached last month in Geneva, Switzerland, according to Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick.

item.title: FT: Eric Trump Says He's Open to Political Office
item.description: During his Time Person of the Year interview in December, then President-elect Donald Trump was asked about a potential family political dynasty.
